landing.title: Support Black equity, every day

charityIntro.title: Stop wasting tabs, start changing the world.
charityIntro.subTitle: Little actions can have big results. With Tab for Black Equity, you can help make a positive impact on charities uplifting Black communities just by opening more browser tabs.

Mission.subtitleText: To make giving back easier than ever
Mission.bodyText: We believe everyone should make a difference for racial equity. Through our partnerships with Thurgood Marshall College Fund and the Bail Project, you can be sure each tab you open is advancing Black equity.

Financials.title: Transparent Financials
Financials.text: Every tab does make an impact!  Check out how much we've raised together.

questions.question: How does opening tabs raise money for charity?
questions.answer: Every time you open a new tab, there will be a few ads in the right corner of your home screen. These ads generate the revenue that funds our charitable impact. And the best part? It's completely free!

questions.question: What type of images can I expect on my new tab page?
questions.answer: Each day our Tabbers are welcomed with breathtaking images captured by Black photographers. See the collection [here](https://unsplash.com/collections/l26tWeG5IJw/black-equity).

questions.question: What nonprofit does Tab for Black Equity support?
questions.answer: Tab for Black Equity supports [The Bail Project] (https://bailproject.org/) and [Thurgood Marshall College Fund] (https://www.tmcf.org/?gclid=CjwKCAiA5t-OBhByEiwAhR-hmzFLgTNoslU9vYn6NAWGC-XBM5zm2kOeuNLPQdo7yFMlEv0PixPbpRoCKEcQAvD_BwE). We are proud to support these incredible organizations that work to uplift their communities towards paths of empowerment and opportunity.

questions.question: How can I find out about new updates and announcements?
questions.answer: Stay in touch with us on social media! Follow us @tabforacause on [TikTok] (https://www.tiktok.com/@tabforacause), [Instagram] (https://www.instagram.com/tabforacause/), [Twitter] (https://twitter.com/TabForACause), and [Facebook] (https://www.facebook.com/TabForACause).

questions.question: This all sounds amazing! How else can I help?
questions.answer: Invite your friends and family to join in! Everybody who joins helps advance Black equity.
